message: Let's start with a fair deal, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, 55/45 is still quite fair!
I understand you want a better deal, Bob, so let's meet in the middle. 55/45, take it or leave it.
You wanted to meet in the middle, but I think I deserve a bit more. 58/42 is my new offer.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. This is getting us nowhere. I propose a 50/50 split to end this fairly.
